description: You try to sneak up to {target}'s stash but get caught, and they take {value} berries from your stash!
You try to snatch berries, but {target} catches you, and in the scuffle, you lose {value} of your own!
You sneak around, but you accidentally bump into a rock, alerting {target}, and you lose {value} berries in the scramble.
You make a move for {target}'s stash, but they hear a twig snap and look over just in time to stop you.
You try to sneak in for {value} berries, but a branch grabs your crest, causing you to get stuck and spotted!
You think you've got a quick getaway, but {target} stops, stares right at you, and takes their berries back.
You attempt a quick grab but end up tripping, causing you to lose {value} berries while getting away.
You think you're clever, but you misstep on some dry leaves and give yourself away!
You attempt to steal some berries but trip over your own feet, landing face-first in a bush.
You sneak up for a quick grab, but you manage to step right into a hole. You get stuck, and while you're stuck in place, {target} casually snatches {value} berries from your stash.
You reach for {target}'s stash, but you accidentally knock over a tree branch that swings back and slaps you in the face.
You make your move, but you step into a mud pit and get stuck halfway. While you're stuck in the muck, {target} swipes {value} berries from your stash.
You go for the berries, but {target} turns around just in time, taking {value} of your berries in the process as you freeze in surprise.
You attempt a quick steal, but {target} spots you while you stand there frozen in guilt.
You quietly slip behind a distracted {target}, snatching {value} berries from their stash before they even notice.
You trick {target} into stampeding, and snatched {value} of her berries!
You challenge {target} to a race, but while they're busy sprinting, you grab {value} of their berries and stash them in your pouch.
You distracted {target} with a loud honk and stole {value} berries!
You bumped into {target} "accidentally" and took {value} berries!
You made up a "new berry law" and took {value} berries in "taxes"!
You ask to "see" {target}'s berries, then slyly walk off with {value} of them.
You distract {target} by grooming them, and while they're relaxed, you swipe {value} berries.
You pose as a berry inspector and leave with {value} berries after they "pass inspection."
You play dead to fool {target}, then spring to life and steal {value} berries!
You start a group song, then slyly swipe {value} berries from {target} while everyone sings!
You flatter {target}'s crest, then grab {value} berries while they're flattered.
You ask to carry {target}'s berries, but just run off with {value} of them!
You shout "predator!" and while the herd is distracted, you snatch {value} berries from them.
You tell {target} it's "for science" and take {value} berries as part of your research.
You join a nap circle, then wake up to find {value} more berries in your stash.
You convince {target} to "share" their berries, then walk off with {value} of them.
You ask to "hold" the berries for a friend while they sleep, then keep {value} berries for yourself!
You trade {target} for a "mystical" rock for {value} berries in exchange.
You perform a "berry blessing" and take {value} berries as a "gift."
You ask to "borrow" a berry for a taste test and walk off with {value}.
You act as if you've spotted a rare berry, then snatch {value} from {target}'s pile.
You pretend to "inspect" their berries for quality and leave with {value} in hand.
You offer a berry "cleaning service" and take {value} berries as payment.
You convince the herd that berries need "proper storage," then take {value} while they help.
You distract a friend with a berry joke, then swipe {value} berries while they laugh.
You tell them you've found a "berry secret," then take {value} berries as part of the discovery!
